release_notes:
**New features:**
• Automated color separation export: save each color in your image as a separate png with transparent background (for screenprinting and other applications)
• New UI theme customization options in the Preferences menu! (7 base themes + 9 accent colors to choose from)

**Changes/improvements:**
• Ordered dithering (Bayer) color mapping improvements when using the Custom Palette option with 3 colors
• Improved the Levels histogram to make it more accurate
• Added a menu option that opens the app user guide (Help -> Documentation)
• Added FAQ section in the Documentation modal
• Enhanced update notification system
• Added keyboard shortcuts list in Documentation modal

**Bug fixes:**
• Fixed a scaling glitch that was happening when opening and closing the Updates modal
• Fixed custom palettes color swatches overlapping with action buttons in modal

**Maintenance:**
• Dependencies updates

download_info.instructions:
Download the latest version from your LemonSqueezy account:
https://app.lemonsqueezy.com/my-orders

update_message: Info: this version is no longer supported
